# Vendor Asset Provenance

This directory contains third-party libraries embedded for offline use in the xplat Task UI.

## xterm.js

Terminal emulator library for the web.

- **Version**: 5.3.0
- **License**: MIT
- **Homepage**: https://xtermjs.org/
- **Repository**: https://github.com/xtermjs/xterm.js
- **Downloaded from**:
  - `xterm.css`: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/xterm@5.3.0/css/xterm.css
  - `xterm.min.js`: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/xterm@5.3.0/lib/xterm.min.js

## xterm-addon-fit

Fit addon for xterm.js that enables the terminal to fit its container.

- **Version**: 0.10.0
- **License**: MIT
- **Repository**: https://github.com/xtermjs/xterm.js (packages/addon-fit)
- **Downloaded from**:
  - `addon-fit.min.js`: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@xterm/addon-fit@0.10.0/lib/addon-fit.min.js

## Bootstrap

CSS framework for responsive web design.

- **Version**: 5.3.2
- **License**: MIT
- **Homepage**: https://getbootstrap.com/
- **Repository**: https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap
- **Downloaded from**:
  - `bootstrap.min.css`: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css
  - `bootstrap.bundle.min.js`: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.2/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js

---

**Downloaded**: 2025-01-07

All assets are subject to their respective licenses. See each project's repository for full license text.
